content: *stash all of your stuff in these stylish crochet baskets yarnspirations * --- *skill level * beginner --- **materials ** bernat® mega bulky™ 10 5 oz/300 g 64 yds/58 m *small version * linen 88021 *3 balls* *medium version * new gold 88609 *5 balls* *large version * teal 88206 *6 balls* *additional materials * stitch marker --- **note ** *bernat mega bulky is currently only available at jo-ann fabric and craft stores deserres and lens mill * ---
